name: Modern Building Services
description: Modern Building Services journal appeals to forward-thinking and imaginative building-services engineers looking to design, construct and run buildings that respond to the twin challenges of comfort and environmental concerns such as climate change. Our circulation of over 22,000 (ABC)  issues per month is the largest controlled circulation for the UK building-services industry.
